name: Zombo Buster Rising
description: Shoot zombies from terrace like a boss! Zombo Buster Rising Remastered brings you a nostalgic experience of classic 2D side shooting-defense in enhanced build right from your Steam library!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 350 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Pretty easy maxed out everything in the game in under 2 hours. Fun for what I paid though, recommended if you like tower defense games.
fun little game easy worth a buy if you are into casual zombieshooters

It takes me about 3 hours to go through all 30 levels. The game is simple and straightforward. Nothing out of expectation but still good for time killing. Worthwhile if you buy it on sale.  Only one let-down: I was expecting switching among the three characters for different gaming experience ... but no such an option.
